Docs.summary: Specifies that comparison with a string property value is not case-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.PropertyConditionFlags None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the property value is tested using default behavior (case-sensitive comparison for strings).
